name: Miner Troubles
description:
Help the young Mr. Troubles gather ores in a stress-free environment (Seriously, nothing's gonna jump out at you; I haven't added those in yet ;)

Game originally made during the "Miz Jam 1" game jam hosted in August 2020, where the theme was everyone had to use the same art assets (https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack)

INSTRUCTIONS

Mouse Left Click: Interact with objects and UI elements

Mouse Scroll Wheel: Zoom in/out

SOURCE CODE

https://github.com/Intradom/Miner_Troubles

UPCOMING FEATURES (For post-jam work)

Robot workers

Equipment inventory

Random delivery goldfish

Slot machines

Backstory

Skin-change wardrobe

MORE EFFECTS AND BLING

EXTERNAL ASSETS

Background Music: "8 Bit Presentation" from Fesliyan Studios

SFX: Self-generated with Bfxr

Art: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

A* Pathfinding Scripts: https://arongranberg.com/astar/download
